title: Letter CXXXVII. To the Same, and on the Same Day.

paragraphs.text: Letter CXXXVII. To the Same, and on the Same Day.

(On the subject of Easter, acknowledging the trouble Proterius has taken, - to which is joined a request that the accounts of the oeconomi[fn-23-P2311_545761:1-nf] should be audited by priests, not lay persons.)

references.text: Aeconomi (stewards) revere officers appointed to manage the revenues of each diocese under the bishops' direction, when the bishops and their archdeacons had enough to do otherwise:cf. Bingham, Antiq., Bk. III. chap. xii.
